title: ArtyTorrent Pack 57-Ueberschall House Essentials Drumloops-WAV
description:
ArtyTorrent Pack 57-Ueberschall House Essentials Drumloops-WAV
--------------------------------------------------------------

I recently got hold of Ueberschall&#039;s House Essentials CD and it&#039;s a monster!
I&#039;m going to upload it in sections for bandwidth reasons.
This pack contains all the drum loops, which are at 130bpm. 

Torrent contains 28 RAR files with an incredible 644 loops
----------------------------------------------------------
Various styles are featured including straight house, garage, shuffle, groove, tribal and breakbeat. Also includes some nice percussion loops which can be layered up to create new beats.

All samples are normalized 16-bit WAVs at 44.1KHz. I&#039;ve not had a chance to acidize them, but since they are all at 130bpm that shouldn&#039;t be an issue.

In the next couple of days I&#039;ll upload the rest of the samples from this disc, so you can look forward to hundreds of drum and percussion oneshots, bass sounds, instrument oneshots, vocals and SFX.

--
Arty - "House of Love"
14th February 2008.
